title: Understanding Lithium's Role
text: Lithium is commonly used in the treatment of certain mental health conditions. Consider what conditions it is most effective for.

title: Focus on Bipolar Disorder
text: Think about the types of episodes that occur in bipolar disorder and how lithium might help manage them.

hintAnswer: a $$first-line$$ choice in the management of mania and mixed mania, and with bipolar maintenance
title: Identifying Lithium's Primary Use
text: What is lithium primarily used for in mental health treatment?
choices: a $$first-line$$ choice in the management of mania and mixed mania, and with bipolar maintenance

increased heart rate, elevated blood pressure, rapid breathing, tensed muscles, sweating, digestive issues (nausea, diarrhea, or constipation), weakened immune system, and insomnia or sleep disturbances
a class of medications that help clients fall and stay asleep
a heightened state of arousal and worry that may not always have a clear external cause
